# 深入理解Node.js：核心思想与源码分析

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shenru-lijie-node-js-hexinsixiang-yu-yuanma-fenxi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shenru-lijie-node-js-hexinsixiang-yu-yuanma-fenxi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shenru-lijie-node-js-hexinsixiang-yu-yuanma-fenxi
shenru-lijie-node-js-hexinsixiang-yu-yuanma-fenxi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shenru-lijie-node-js-hexinsixiang-yu-yuanma-fenxi
shenru-lijie-node-js-hexinsixiang-yu-yuanma-fenxi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
